description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry Lemonade With Gin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Blueberry Lemonade With Gin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chill 8 cocktail glasses. Place sugar, blueberries and 1 1/2 cups water in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Stir until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until blueberries soften.
Strain mixture into a bowl, pressing gently with a spoon to extract as much liquid as possible. Discard pulp. Add lemon juice to syrup, cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until cold.
Pour 30ml gin into each cocktail glass. Add 1 1/2 tbs blueberry syrup into each glass and mix. Top each glass with lemonade. Serve with extra blueberries.
